title: Please help me to id this font
content:
Thank you very much in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [a.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=a_19.jpg) | 40.69 KB |
author: contohabc

comments.content: I went through the entire Bowfin Script Font Guide and didn’t come up with an exact match… however, a couple of reasonably similar faces include [Bickley Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111130516/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/bickley-script/script/testdrive.html?s=Original&p=72) and [Spring Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111130516/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/spring/light/testdrive.html?s=Original&p=72).
